text1: There are no records of this ship ever being produced anywhere in the sector, and for good reason. No sane individual with the means to produce the core systems of a Paragon would integrate them into an Atlas' fragile superstructure. And yet the thought of sitting comfortably behind a nigh impenetrable shield, while the thundering chorus of four overdriven large ballistics reverberates through the superstructure as they rain hot metal death onto any opposition, does have some primal allure. Just don't let the shields fall.
